name: Runnymede
description: The neighbourhood has two Toronto Public Library locations, Runnymede and Annette, and there is a nearby location in Swansea.

scores.walksubheading: Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
scores.transitsubheading: Transit is convenient for most trips.
scores.bikesubheading: Flat as a pancake, good bike lanes.

commute.neareststop: 593 Annette Street is a 14 minute walk from the 2 LINE 2 (BLOOR - DANFORTH) at the RUNNYMEDE STATION - EASTBOUND PLATFORM stop.
commute.nearbyparks: Beresford Park, Beresford Park and Malta Park.

name: Lawrence Park
description: Lawrence Park was one of Toronto's first planned garden suburbs.

scores.walksubheading: Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
scores.transitsubheading: Transit is convenient for most trips.
scores.bikesubheading: Flat as a pancake, good bike lanes.

commute.neareststop: 378 Blythwood Rd, Toronto is a 14 minute walk from the 2 LINE 2 (BLOOR - DANFORTH) at the RUNNYMEDE STATION - EASTBOUND PLATFORM stop.
commute.nearbyparks: Beresford Park, Beresford Park and Malta Park.

name: Roncesvalles
description: Culturally, the area is known as the centre of the Polish community in Toronto with prominent Polish institutions, businesses and St Casimir's Catholic Church located on Roncesvalles Avenue.

scores.walksubheading: Most errands can be accomplished on foot.
scores.transitsubheading: Transit is convenient for most trips.
scores.bikesubheading: Flat as a pancake, good bike lanes.

commute.neareststop: 276 Roncesvalles Ave, Toronto is a 14 minute walk from the 2 LINE 2 (BLOOR - DANFORTH) at the RUNNYMEDE STATION - EASTBOUND PLATFORM stop.
commute.nearbyparks: Beresford Park, Beresford Park and Malta Park.
